WOW! 1.5 gig for each movie. That is very small bluray. Nothing looks bluray unless at least 4 gig plus. I do not know why people compare dvd size to bluray and say its great. I downloaded a rambo movie claimed to be 1.5 bluray and I could not see how it would be bluray. It looked worse than dvd.


So I ask what are you watching these with special glasses? Not one nice download collection on the internet for all 7 of these at 28 gig which would be good bluray torrent. Sorry, but not sharing this. Thanks for upload, but no thanks. I seen all movies, which means I am looking for good bluray quality.

Since, this site has no edit comment button, I will have to do another. I could download a 28 gig in less than 24 hours so that is no biggie for me. Just cause people can't handle the size does not mean the ones that can handle it gets nothing.
